00008 Array :: Array( int m1, int m2) {
00009   //printf("Constructor Array(int, int)\n\n");
00010   ndims = 2;
00011   dims = new int[2];
00012   dims[0] = m1;
00013   dims[1] = m2;
00014     nelem = m1*m2;
00015   data = new double[nelem];
00016   
00017 };

00021 Array:: Array( int m1, int m2, int m3) {
00022   //printf("Constructor Array(int, int, int)\n\n");
00023   ndims = 3;
00024   dims = new int[3];
00025   dims[0] = m1;
00026   dims[1] = m2;
00027   dims[2] = m3;
00028   nelem = m1*m2*m3;
00029   data = new double[nelem];
00030   
00031 };

00035 Array:: Array( int m1, int m2, int m3, int m4) {
00036   //printf("Constructor Array(int, int, int, int)\n\n");
00037   ndims = 4;
00038   dims = new int[4];
00039   dims[0] = m1;
00040   dims[1] = m2;
00041   dims[2] = m3;
00042   dims[3] = m4;
00043   nelem = m1*m2*m3*m4;
00044   data = new double[nelem];
00045   
00046 };

00048 // ---------------------------------------------------------------
00049 
00050 Array :: Array(const int* _dims, int _ndims){
00051   //printf("Constructor Array(const int*, int)\n\n");
00052   ndims = _ndims;
00053   dims  = new int[_ndims];
00054   nelem = 1;
00055   for (int i=0; i < ndims; ++i) {
00056     dims[i] = _dims[i];
00057     nelem *= dims[i];
00058   }
00059   data = new double[nelem];
00060 };
00061 
00062 // ---------------------------------------------------------------
00063 
00064 Array :: Array(const Array& A){
00065   //printf("Consctructor: Array( const Array&)\n\n");
00066   ndims = A.ndims;
00067   dims = new int[ndims];
00068   for(int i=0; i < ndims; ++i ) {
00069     dims[i] = A.dims[i];
00070   }
00071   nelem = A.nelem;
00072   data = new double[nelem];
00073   for(int i=0; i < nelem; ++i ) {
00074     data[i] = A.data[i];
00075   }
00076 };
00077 
00078 
00079 // ---------------------------------------------------------------
00080 
00081 bool haveSameSize(const Array& A1, const Array& A2) {
00082   if (A1.getNumberOfDimensions() != A2.getNumberOfDimensions())
00083     return 0;
00084   
00085   for (int i = 0; i < A1.getNumberOfDimensions(); i++) {
00086     if (A1.getDimensions()[i] != A2.getDimensions()[i])
00087       return 0;
00088   }
00089   
00090   return 1;
00091 };

00097 void Array :: printToFile(FILE* file) const {};
00098 void Array :: print() const {printToFile(stdout);};
00099 void Array :: printDimensions() const {
00100   printf("printDimensions of Array at %p - ",this);
00101   printf("%d Dimensions:",ndims);
00102   for (int i=0; i<ndims; ++i)
00103     printf("%d ",dims[i]);
00104   printf("(=%d elements)\n",nelem);
00105 };

00180 void Array3D :: printToFile(FILE* file) const {
00181         
00182     
00183     fprintf(file,"%d %d %d\n",dims[0], dims[1], dims[2]);
00184         
00185     for (int k1=0; k1 < dims[0]; k1++) {
00186         fprintf(file,"A[%d][][] = \n",k1);
00187         printToFileArray2D(A[k1],dims[1],dims[2],file);
00188     }
00189 };
